title: SPAR: Session-based Pipeline for Adaptive Retrieval on Legacy File Systems
summary: The ability to extract value from historical data is essential for enterprise decision-making. However, much of this information remains inaccessible within large legacy file systems that lack structured organization and semantic indexing, making retrieval and analysis inefficient and error-prone.
